name: Bobs Boomerang Adventure
description:
A scientist accidentally shrinks himself, armed with only a boomerang he must find the growth serum in this Metroidvania game!

(wait for the web build to load trust me it will)

(the cut scene in the web version is buggy, the windows download fixes the problem )
